channel.title: What If on MechanicLog
channel.description: Recent content in What If on MechanicLog

item.title: What If Diesel is Put Into a Gas Car?
item.description: A local gas station recently had a delivery mix up causing diesel fuel to be dumped into the gasoline tanks that supply their fuel pumps. The station was quick to catch the mistake, but not before a few unlucky commuters had a nasty surprise. While delivery mishaps are rare, itâ€™s not unheard of for a driver to accidentally fill up their vehicle with the wrong fuel. Even though diesel pumps are different in color and size, and diesel gives off a different smell it still happens.
